scene_description_enriched: The upper portion of the image depicts a crowned figure, likely a king or saint, seated on a red throne against a blue, star-filled background. The figure wears a white robe adorned with gold patterns and holds a scepter in one hand and a globe in the other, signifying royal or divine authority. A halo surrounds the figure's head. The lower portion of the image presents an outdoor landscape with rolling hills, scattered trees, and a cluster of buildings, including a church with a spire and a fortified tower. The scene is framed by an elaborate floral border with gold accents.
